data.prayer: Over 24.32 percent of the people of Nkhata Bay are far from Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nkhata Bay, Malawi
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Nkhata Bay, Malawi a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 2,432 believers in Nkhata Bay that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Nkhata Bay, Malawi.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Gujarati people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Lord, make the 2,432 believers in Nkhata Bay to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 11,867 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Nkhata Bay, Malawi.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 2,432 believers in Nkhata Bay to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.
